review_text: I think course is high quality and very informative in an approachable, clear presentation. The speaking was clear with great bullet points and believable, helpful information. Thank you so much for the great presentation. I will need to watch it several times as there is so much information it's difficult to absorb all at once but it's laid out well so I can find what I want to review again quickly. I highly recommend this course to anyone looking to build their copyrighting business.
Good course. Informative.

From my perspective, Carrie knows very well how to write lightweight sales copy, but this doesn't help her or her students to stand out from other competitors. 
Typically, alienating creates tension between the seller and the buyer. It makes a remarkable amount of buyers curious about what the seller has to offer because they will find out something new. Keep in my that investors might have heard it all.
Great course. Very thorough and it was great to learn a few new things and be reminded of others!
Great Course!
This is a great course for future copywriters.

I thought this course was very helpful. There was a lot of information that I will be able to use in my daily work life. Carrie took the time to describe each concept in detail with step by step walkthroughs showing me how to execute for my clients. I like how the chapters and topics were broken down and organized. I recommend this course for anyone looking to learn best practices for e-commerce copywriting.

This course provides lots of essential information and gives you a solid base for your copywriting endeavours. Would recommend it to anyone who wants to get started in E-Commerce Copywriting or educate themselves on SEO.
Very useful information.
A very good course on using effective copywriting for e-commerce businesses!

The actual instruction time is relatively short, but I kept stopping the videos to take notes! Her pace is easy to follow and instructions are very clear and to-the-point. I recommend watching the chapters once all of the way through and then again to take notes, because she packed in a lot of useful info and very helpful tips!
This course definitely offers something to everyone watching it, no matter if they already have any experience. Recommend!
Good

As a writer, I felt that the E-Commerce Copywriting course was incredibly valuable! Carrie did an excellent job explaining the 'why' factor behind purchasing decisions. I especially liked that the course was filled with practical tips that can be implemented immediately. Highly recommend, 6/5! üòä

Amazing work by Carrie. I am writing product descriptions for some time now but this course really helped me understand how to write a killer product description. I've learned many things and I won't be repeating the mistakes. Thank you Carrie!

A good course. I would have liked to have seen more examples that followed the writing exercises as I felt the exercises were very subjective, but the examples that were provided were extremely useful.
Excellent copywriting tips specific to e-commerce and product descriptions! Easy to follow the material with all the examples provided.
I learned a lot of new things. The only drawback is that the course should have closed captions or subtitles option. Otherwise, great work by Carrie!

Although this course is short it contains a lot of information.
Practical exercise and examples are extremely useful
Thank you.

I thought this was a very informative and very well-organized course.  As a small business owner who wants to master these skills instead of paying high amounts of money for good copy, I found that I will probably have to go through it a few more times (and complete the exercises again) to really get the hang of everything and start implementing this information.

Great information, really enjoyable. Will use the information for sure.

One question came up in a quiz before the section it was discussed played. The question was about unique content in regard to SEO. 

Also, can I get a gig fixing the captions? There are a lot of wrong things like "would" instead of "wood".
The practices were great and I learned new things about copywriting

The instructor seems a lovely person who, I'm sure, understands copywriting very well (I would probably hire her). However, I don't think this was a great course. Though there was some useful information in it, I found it very hard to follow. I kept having to pause and rewind because the information was shared without being broken down to help digest it. It lacked crucial real examples to help with understanding, which is a shame because I finished the course feeling that I did not learn very much.

I also felt the structure of the course could have been better. For example, SEO may be one of the first things you have to consider before starting to write any content but it should not be the first thing you are taught in a copywriting course.
Loved it. I never gave expert writing a thought, but this has definitely opened up new ways for me to further improve my e-commerce web-content for my clients

Carrie did a wonderful job with this course by sharing simple and effective instructions on how to write good copy for your ecom products. I really liked this course and I'm happy to get new one once it is available.
Carrie was brilliant to learn from. Super informative with great takeaway exercises and checklists so that you can put your learning into practice straight away.

Really well done - I learned a lot and will re-watch the course so that I can catch more of it.  (There's a lot of good information, too much for me to absorb in one go.)  The instructor was awesome, really good demeanor and easy to learn from I felt.  Five stars to her.  
The closed captions need to be checked and corrected.  I'm pretty sure they're incorrect in several places, which is a bit confusing for someone who needs them.  (I have auditory processing difficulties.)
Also, the audio of the course wasn't ideal.  I don't know enough about mics to know what was wrong, but it felt like the room was echoey, and also like I could hear the instructor's mouth smack a lot, which seemed more like a mic problem than a person problem.  Taking off one star for the captions (mostly the captions) and the audio.
Excellent course for beginners, going through the necessary fundamentals every copywriter should know!
Wow, I am really surprised by the number of great, ready to use tips, and love the way the course is synthesized.
Well-structured, easy to follow, and practical advice.
Great value 100% worth the money:)
Very useful and informative. Thank you
the course was short, to the point and very informative.
Very helpful and informative!
Tremendously enlightening and informative for such a short course!
Awesome copywriting course!
good course. nice short videos.
Full of information but really clear and easy to understand, I enjoyed taking this course!
Very helpful tips.
Overall a great course. To the point and have a lot of experience and insight about copywriting. I recommend.
Thanks, Carrie, for demystifying the world of copywriting. The tools you provide are practical and plentiful. You have inspired me to give freelancing a shot.

I was disappointed to learn that this was a series for both people wanting to learn copywriting and businesses who wanted to learn to do their own copywriting. There were moments that just felt too generic or did not apply to me.

I was really hoping to see some example work. Like:
1. an example of what you ask the client to provide to you (is it a form the client fills out?)
2. an example of a brief (the item that the client provides to you)
3. an example of a completed piece ready to submit to a client in Amazon formatting and in Shopify formatting

I like Carrie. I did the training based on one of her youtube posts. I don't think I would recommend it to anyone.
Carrie is an excellent course teacher. Her deep insights into e-commerce product descriptions give me the confidence I need to give this career a try.
Some very good tips and ideas, even for someone like me who have been writing web copy for 25 years
I found this course to be comprehensive and informative. I now feel empowered to produce copy that informs readers and improves conversion rates.

the course was super informative and the homework print outs were absolutely perfect but I would recommend adding examples of what the structure of your amazon or shopify product descriptions should look like. Its one thing to state the differences but its another for a visual learner to see what is expected.
Very easy to follow, the exercises were very helpful, and great instruction! :)
Eye-opening course
Loved, loved, loved this course! Packed full of useful and practical information really helped me to brush up on existing skills.
This course is super helpful and full of actionable advice.

A fantastic in-depth course that had detailed practical learning material. Highly recommend it to anyone considering copywriting for themselves, as a freelancer or someone wanting to know what to look for in a professional.

Great course, it's obvious that carrie knows her stuff, I just wish there was more usable done-for-you assets that came with the course. Felt like she held back some of the more advanced secrets as well, but overall I did learn a few new things for ecommerce copywriting so it was helpful in the end.
Too much distracting background noise. However, the content is steller and very informative to new and experienced copywriters.
Very informative!

The content was easy to understand and interesting to follow along with. The course-summary and practice exercises for every chapter were a nice addition to provide structure and extra practice/examples.

I found this course to be engaging and informative. The exercises helped me understand the finer points that were discussed in the videos, and the videos themselves covered a wide range of topics. The quizzes were a little easy, but the exercises already do a good job in reinforcing the lessons learned here.
Great info and delivered in an easily, digestible manner :

Carrie does a terrific job of providing a clear and actionable process to overcome any copy hang-ups you might have or come across as you set up or refresh your website or eCommerce shop. She actually describes how to accomplish this task instead of the vague "info" I've found elsewhere.
Now I can't read a sentence of copy the same way - I immediately start to dissect it. LOL. 
It's so helpful to know the foundation along with the components of what builds copy that connects and converts.

Cheers and Good Vibes,
Vanessa
House of Redford
I loved this course! Easily worth more than double what I paid for it. I now feel comfortable opening 2+ more writing gigs on Fiverr because of what I learned in this course.
This course gave me a great foundational understanding of how to write e-commerce, and I plan on applying the information I learned to my freelance editing and writing.
Very well structured and easy to follow. Carrie is definitely an expert at what she does.

This course is well organized with examples and practice exercises. Carrie provided great insights on E-commerce copywriting tactics. It would be great if more descriptive examples are provided on Amazon Product Listings.
Excellent class!
The presentation was easy to understand. Direct and clear.
Its one of the best online learning materials i have ever come across
Very Helpful! Thank you. :)

Incredible course - a must-have for every copywriter! This course is jam-packed with useful information about writing strategies and concepts that will take your writing to the next level. I highly recommend this course because it's truly beneficial in expanding your writing style and system into a more strategized method with a winning formula in mind.
This course really gives an in-depth look at e-commerce writing and helps me to understand what exactly I need to do. Carrie is amazing!
Incredibly helpful information which I was certainly use going forward with my Fiverr gigs!
Concise course that dives into the technical side of writing for Ecommerce businesses!

This course was simply amazing! It allowed me to truly understand the key information and  tips that are essential in being a professional, versatile, and skilled copywriter. Thank you so much Carrie! :)
Not worth the money

Both personable and informative, Carrie provides wonderful tips and techniques for those getting started with online copywriting, and helping Fiverr buyers understand what to expect from their freelancers.

The quality of this course is amazing. Top-notch video, great explanations, clear examples of what to do and what not to do - An immense help. I've written a bunch, but never with the intent to sell something. I will certainly come back to rewatch key parts of this course while practicing and ultimately starting my gigs around this subject.

Thank you, and well done!

This course was very helpful in learning the basics, and some advanced tips, for copywriting and how to make your writing convert visitors to customers. I feel more confident and prepared to use this information and improve my writing in the ways that I need to for professional copywriting. It was definitely worth completing the course.
Overall light on content. Audio quality is not the greatest. I learned a decent amount, but there are better courses available.
Great Content!!
A quick but incredibly helpful course! There is a TON of information packed into this thing. Thank you Carrie for doing this :)
I loved it!  I'm about to watch it again and will continue to do so until I feel like I've mastered what she taught.
Carrie is a true professional. I highly recommend this course!
Very Well Explained
Very clearly constructed. I have come away from this feeling much more aware and knowledgable on SEO text across platforms

Well its a course  that give me alot to thinking about and i feel it can help me and having it in my library of course i can see it again and again and i learn alot that can help me going forward . the teacher was wise  and i enjoy the course.
Loved everything about this course. The way you spoke was clear and understanding. I will surely practice all of the tips and tricks. Thank you for making this course.
Great course.
Good to start with how to write copy!
Very informative
Very well explained and easy to follow along. I now have a better understanding of copywriting.
I would recommend this course to others
Clear and concise introduction with main ideas
Very informative and helpful. The exercises really gave the advice tangibility and a great place to start and how to practice.
Rich content! I will go over again and again to reinforce learning,
Cool.
Loved it!
Loved it!

Demotivated fake teacher, doesn't know how to teach, and when she tells you to practice something, then when we have practiced that, so then there is no support that someone can tell you if it's right or wrong.

its just like reading a book.
Helpful and liked the excercises
Very clear, friendly and top expert advise.
Great content!
Valuable & essential information in every chapter. Thank you!

Great course! Very informative with lots of actionable tips -- the only thing I would've loved to see is Carrie's interpretation of her practice questions. It would've been cool to compare, but otherwise, definitely worth every penny!
I just wished I had a way to check my results for the writing exercises

So far I am learning a lot from this course. The writing examples are definitely helpful when it comes to thinking out of the box but strategically. The content of the videos is also very easy to follow and straight to the point.
Very informative with great exercises for enhancing writing skills!!
excellent course
One of the best courses I have ever watched on fiverr.
An engaging and informative course! Ideal as a refresher or for those new to copywriting. Carrie spoke clearly and enthusiastically, offering lots of top-rate tips.

I highly recommend this course to anyone who is looking to strengthen their skills in writing for E-commerce! Carrie delivers amazing insights into how to use SEO, write on-brand content and how to find a brand's tone of voice. This course really helped me to expand my knowledge on copywriting.
Full of useful golden nuggets of copywriting wisdom well worth its price. I definitely recommend to anyone looking to establish copywriting foundations.
I loved this course, and valuable information is packed within every minute!
I enjoyed this course! Carrie is great at what she does.

While the course is informative, short, and concise, we users would greatly appreciate more frameworks and some swipe files! Otherwise, it would be like all the other courses outside of Fiverr; general and not much fun.
nice
Great course. The instructor is very knowledgeable. A lot of useful information was crammed into it. I highly recommend it.

I was once an eBay seller for a few years and did just dropshipping from China products without changing or improving any of the original product description content. I finally understand why my sales were stagnant and conversions were bad with few return customers. Just depend on new customers and keep churning new sales to keep going. I truly appreciate that this course is a whole new skill set for my new writing business now. Looking forward to practicing more from this course and capitalizing on my past eBay selling experience. This course is so valued packed and enriching with simple to understand useful tips! Thanks Carrie you are amazing!

I found my way here from YT and I'm glad I did. This course provided even more great information, and some real, actionable ways to practice the skills. As someone gearing up and learning as much as I can before launching my own gigs, the examples of just what practicing looks like are invaluable.

This course has everything you need to understand e-commerce copywriting and get better at it. Carrie explains all the strategies very well with precise examples. I have been writing copy for a few years now, but this course made me improve a lot and I am now more confident in my skills.

I appreciate Carrie's authenticity, both on her youtube channel (where I learned about her) and now in this course. She provides thoughtful content with no gimmicks or aggressive upsells. This course was the perfect length for what I was looking for and provided enough detail, tips, and skills without overwhelming me. I'd recommend it to other cw beginners or business owners looking to apply it for themselves.
Great informative course!
Well organized and delivered.  Carrie is a great asset to the Fiverr platform, and one of the main reasons I joined.

Throughout the course, Carrie's insightful expertise demonstrates how to create a professional product listing in an easy-to-digest format. With this in mind, I would highly recommend her course for new Fiverr sellers who intend to offer e-commerce copywriting gigs.
Great content and very useful tips.
Informative, clear and conscise.

Easy to follow and understand. The different exercises and quizzes are thought provoking and make you think outside your normal way of thinking! Cant wait to get started with my own copywriting business! Thanks Carrie!
My descriptions are completely different from how I used to do them. Very good and useful information on this course, I'm happy.
Very easy to unterstand. Especially the explanation WHY certain copy is good, and others bad, helped me to understand and learn.

As a copywriter who has been considering opening services for e-commerce content writing, I'm really glad I decided to invest in this course! I feel much more well-equipped in this area after taking this class. Thank you, Carrie!
Good

I am pleased with the simplicity and direct nature of this course. Carrie has made it easy to grasp the main job description and skills needed as a sales copywriter. I am looking forward to starting my freelance career and feel prepared thanks to this course.
I enjoyed the course. As a new freelance copywriter, this was a great place for me to start. I enjoyed the way the instructor taught this course.
great course, but would have liked more detail on how to write and structure different types of copy - i.e. home pages, specific website pages, etc.
Excellent copywriting course for beginners that really provides you with the basics you need to start.
Great course with a deeper level of information.
Not worth of the funds and time. Pretty basic stuff and boring overall presentation.

I am taking a 500 dollar Copywriting Course as well as reading a detailed copywriting book I got off Amazon. Its exactly as her YT video said, alot of the information is repackaged and reused, including the main points of what I've seen in this course. However Carrie does what I think to be a great job delivering the most important lessons in a candor that makes you feel like she cares for your success without undermining your intelligence. Thank You Mrs.French, your course was a blast!
From basics to more niche content, this course taught me important skills and knowledge. I can't wait to apply this to my own Fiverr gigs!
A great introduction for those new to copywriting and writing product descriptions. Would be happy to take more courses from Carrie. Love her YouTube too!
This was great! I know so much more about e-commerce copywriting now. This gave me the confidence I needed after getting bogged down with so much other information. Thank you!
Amazing!

I recently took this course taught by Carrie and it was incredibly informative. I learned so much from her and the way she presented the material made it easy to understand and retain. She's clearly very knowledgeable and experienced. I would highly recommend this course to anyone looking to learn more about E-commerce copywriting and really copywriting in general. It was a great investment of my time and money. Thank you Carrie for sharing your expertise with us. :)
Its good content, to boost sales!
It taught me many new things. Thanks

The course was very informative and helpful.
I gained a lot of knowledge from it.

Thanks, Carrie

Antonio
Easy to follow and very informative. So much information packed into an hour's worth of video.
Just awesome...The course really informative.
easy to understand
Good course!

The 'E-commerce Copywriting: The Key to Conversion' course exceeded my expectations with its comprehensive and practical approach to copywriting for online businesses. The content was well-structured, and the instructor's expertise shone through in every lecture. I highly recommend this course to anyone looking to improve their e-commerce copywriting skills and drive conversions.
Thank you it was a very useful lesson for me.
I loved how she explained a topic that seam challenging to me

If you were having any doubts about whether or not this course is worth it, let me tell you, it is VALUE PACKED! It is very thoughtfully organized, and Carrie delves beyond the surface level of the fundamentals of e-commerce copywriting to actually show you the nuances that separate good, effective writing from not-so-good-nor-effective writing. So glad to have taken this course, and feeling more motivated than ever to continue on my budding freelance journey with the skills I learned from this course. Thank you Carrie!
amazing and practical course!!

Overall the course is great! Yet, I would've liked to see concrete and real Website/Product copy text examples which Carrie would comment on. Although there were helpful examples, it seemed like she wrote them herself (even those she criticized).
valuable curse! thank you!
It was a great experience, I am sure that the knowledge provided will help me a lot to write good ecommerce sales scripts.
absolutely informative.. fully satisfied with her methods and strategies

Each sentence inspires confidence and provides quality information related to the topic. It inspires a lot of confidence to improve my work. 5 stars to Carrie for this course and all her tips on youtube.
Excellent course! I was aware of many of the basic concepts but the detail and exercises will help me in my freelance work. Carrie is a great presenter.
Eye-opening techniques for effective and ethical copywriting. Thank you!
